chronic_insight_iii.name: Chronic Insight III
chronic_insight_iii.description: Reduces the scaling of exp required by 1% (Additively) per each level. Stacks with other Chronic Insight skills.

living_grimoire.name: Living Grimoire
living_grimoire.description: A grimoire that has existed for eons in the stream of time, gaining sentience. Feed it essence to tame it so it can automate spells for you.

echoes_of_time_ii.name: Echoes of Time II
echoes_of_time_ii.description:
Hear echoes from yourselves in different time. Bosses defeated will reduce their future danger by the number of times you have defeated the boss. The danger reduction will persist through rebirths and regressions.

New Boss Danger = Boss Danger - (boss lifetime defeat amount * (0.1 x total echoes of time levels))

eternal_enhancement.name: Eternal Lifestyle
eternal_enhancement.description:
Use the power of time to contain the enhancement of your life. 

Enhancement shall persists through rebirths and regressions.

temporal_fairy_queen.name: Eternal Fairy Empress
temporal_fairy_queen.description:
The will of the fairies will follow Luminara which transcends through time. 

The buffs of "Making of a Fairy Queen" is kept after regression.

time_skip.name: Time Skip
time_skip.description: Skip through time to rebirth earlier. Allows early rebirth at 30 years old.

loop_stride.name: Loop Stride
loop_stride.description:
Allows the completion of exploration multiple times at one time given overflow of progress.

The number of times completed at once is capped by total Eternal Learnings levels.
